updates.title: VAICOM PRO Community Edition for DCS World
updates.releasenotes: Release 3.0.4.0 - Adds F4U-1D as supported module, adds OH-6A mod as supported module, adds Marianas WWII terrain ATC recipients to database, adds airfields and additional ATC recipients for Kola terrain and corrects some changed ones, update radio.lua swap files, fix erroneous SecurityControl error in DCS log,a new Vaicom Theme for DCS, an updated Vaicom manual.
